snippet: Paul Babits has twice qualified for the Olympic trials, and he not only has kept up with the sport, he has also turned it into a business. His wife, Brenda, has been pole-vaulting now for five years.
lead_paragraph: Paul Babits has twice qualified for the Olympic trials, and he not only has kept up with the sport, he has also turned it into a business. His wife, Brenda, has been pole-vaulting now for five years.

headline.seo: Track and Field Masters: Paul and Brenda Babits, 51
